name: Dojo Learning
tag_list: learning, elearning, online-learning, training, education, courses, online-courses, lessons, classes, courseware, assisted-learning, guided-learning, corporate-training, adult-education, adult-learning, howto, how-to
overview:
Dojo Learning is a Canadian e-learning startup that brings online training to any company, small or large. With Dojo Learning, anyone can create, deliver and sell training in minutes, with no technical knowledge or setup required. Both public and private learning networks are possible, complete with your own company branding.

Dojo Learning is the “Basecamp of training”, and our goal is for Dojo to become the “YouTube of Learning”, where everyone will go to learn.

Key features include:

  • Anyone can create lessons through our no-nonsense lesson builder
  • Deliver lessons to anyone with an email
  • Your private learning network with your brand
  • Sell your lessons online
  • We handle all the details
